summary: A Greek American father of a dying boy decides to take his son to Greece to breathe the clean air of his ancestors, in an attempt to save the boy's life. However, money is a problem.
cast: Anthony Quinn|Irene Papas|Inger Stevens|Sam Levene|Val Avery|Tamara Daykarhanova|Peter Mamakos|James Dobson|Zvee Scooler|Bill Walker|H.B. Haggerty|Alan Reed|Radames Pera|Theopharis Lemonopoulos|Stasa Damascus|Katherine Theodore|James Fortunes|Ernest Sarracino|Renata Vanni|Chris Marks|Sandra Damato|Effie Columbus|Peter Kogeones|Tol Avery|Anthony Jochim|George Michaelides|Lisa Moore|Alberto Morin|Lisa Pera|George Savalas|Ron Stein|Peter Xantho
